pageContext.claim: “Crude Oil prices going up as Saudi Arabia cuts production levels. Our great Energy Companies, with millions of JOBS, are starting to look very good again. At the same time, gasoline prices at record lows (like a big Tax Cut). The BEST of all Worlds.”
pageContext.analysis: The oil price jump that day brought U.S. West Texas Intermediate crude futures to $25.78 per barrel. But many U.S. fracking companies are unable to make a profit below $40 a barrel. Gasoline prices were not at a record low in inflation-adjusted prices; the low was reached in 1998.
